QuestData.Title: Wolf Training: Darkwing Roc
QuestData.Description: The windrocs of Nagrand are a smart predator, often swooping down on unwary prey in packs. If your beast doesn't keep an eye on the sky, it's likely to lose both of em.'$B$BHead on out to Nagrand and take on the fiercest windroc of the bunch, the Darkwing Roc. That'll be a good test for the both of ye.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat the Darkwing Roc while riding your Snarler-In-Training.
